name: Hivaneph - The Legend of Elles
description:
This is a demo for a game still in development

Hivaneph is a party based Action RPG, set on the present as we Know.
The characters are members of "Leviathan", a secret organization focused in defend our world from treats came from other worlds. 

For that, the characters use their powers to control the life elements -called naii- to fight against their enemies.

Are you ready to embark on this adventure across the world? Join us and be part of this legend!
